Package p4_group_8_repo

Class InfoScreen

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.InfoScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
ButtonGenerator
public class InfoScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements ButtonGenerator
Represents the Information Screen of the game.
Singleton Design Pattern is applied to this class, so there is only 1 InfoScreen instance throughout the game.
Author:
User

  • Constructor Details

    • InfoScreen

      private InfoScreen()
      private default constructor

    • InfoScreen

      private InfoScreen​(java.lang.String ImageLink)
      This constructor will create an InfoScreen object. It will display instructions to play the game.
      The constructor is declared private to ensure that no other classes can create another InfoScreen instance.
      Parameters:
      ImageLink - The link of the background image of InfoScreen
